title: Living together, avoidant when stressed
content:
Dance floor thoughts 

Can't believe I'm living in this city with you 
5 months!

Can't imagine any other way. You complete me and challenge me in ways I've been too scared to do alone 

**Also living together I've noticed that I think we're both avoidant when we're stressed 

Yes definitely.

title: Architectural style influenced by sky
content:
Musing

How does a cities average color of the sky influence architectural style and color schemes

title: Friendship fractured
content:
Friendship really suffered over the last year and it's made me sad 

I had no one to confide in with how I was feeling 

Obviously would never dictate who someone could be friends with and make them choose sides but you have to know that impacted me?
